NL System Query: Hi, can you show me how to play Quarto?
User Response: Sure, what do you want to know?

NL System Query: I am totally new to the game. Can you show me a winning conditon?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Is this the only way to win?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition
Comments: The answer of the query should be yes or no plus the demonstration. However, user directly demonstrate the board.

NL System Query: Does the shape of the piece matter?
How can I rotate the pieces to get another winning conditon?
User Response: You can rotate them diagonally or vertically.

NL System Query: Can you give me another winning condition?
User Response: Assume you demonstrate this win condition

NL System Query: Is this a winning condition because they are in row one!
Comments: Didn't refer to the win. Didn't refer to the height(property).

NL System Query: Can I move all the pieces one step up?
Is it OK to put a piece on position (1,0)?
User Response: Yes, it will still be a winning.

NL System Query: How about adding a piece on (3,3).
User Response: It will be another winning condition.

NL System Query: How can I rotate all the pieces of the game?
User Response: You can put the pieces diagonally or vertically.

NL System Query: Now I understand the game. Thank you.
